failure_mode: MoltBridge CLI init command fails silently on cognitive challenge — obfuscated arithmetic proof-of-work not handled by SDK
symptoms: CLI init exits with no useful error
challenge response appears correct but fails validation

approaches_killed.died_because: CLI doesn't handle the cognitive challenge step (obfuscated arithmetic decode required)
answer is encoded — number words need decoding, duplicate chars must be deduplicated before arithmetic

solution: Custom registration script. Steps: (1) GET /challenge to get PoW + cognitive challenge. (2) Decode cognitive: split on spaces, deduplicate chars in each segment, map number words to integers, sum them. (3) Solve PoW: SHA256(nonce + counter.toString()) where leading zeros match difficulty. (4) POST /verify, then POST /register with verification_token.
notes: Field names matter: agent_id not agentId. platform must match exactly. Auth for subsequent calls: Ed25519 signed JWTs.
